AI Description: libdrs is a Python library for Differential RNA-seq (Differential RNA sequencing) analysis. It provides various tools for the analysis of gene expression data generated from RNA-seq experiments, focusing on identifying differentially expressed genes between different conditions or treatments.
Core Features: Differential RNA-Seq Analysis, Identification Of Differentially Expressed Genes, Analysis Of Gene Expression Data, Integration With Python For Seamless Data Analysis
General Tags: Python Library, RNA-Seq Analysis, Gene Expression Analysis
